bibl.title: Excavations in the Settlement of Ismant el-Kharab in 1995-1999.

author.forename: with an Appendix by Gillian E.

bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons
bibl.author: HOPE, Colin A.

bibl.note: A summary of the results of the excavations (1995-1999) based upon the published reports, with modifications and additions.
HOPE Colin A., with an Appendix by Gillian E. BOWEN, Excavations in the Settlement of Ismant el-Kharab in 1995-1999.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 167-208, 25 figg., 12 plans.
